name: agentic-fizzbuzz
description: A microservices-based FizzBuzz implementation using Bun workspaces

scripts.dev: bun run --cwd packages/fizz dev & bun run --cwd packages/buzz dev & bun run --cwd packages/fizzbuzz dev & bun run --cwd packages/coordinator dev & bun run --cwd packages/number dev
scripts.build:all: bun run --cwd packages/fizz build && bun run --cwd packages/buzz build && bun run --cwd packages/fizzbuzz build && bun run --cwd packages/coordinator build && bun run --cwd packages/number build
